body.p: To His Excellincy Thomas E. Bramlette Govenor of the state of Kentucky

-- The undersigned citizens of Mercer County very respectfully petition your Excellency to pardon John Patterson convicted in the Mercer circuit Court to the penitentiary of the state for one year, He has a wife & child wholy dependant on him for support, and they are poor and dependant, -- The case presents strong considerations for clemency, They pray that you pardon him.

Nov 14, 1864
J. H Villard
W S Alexander
